full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Information

### Project Title

- LL355 Haffie Shoal Tower Replacement
- **French Title:** Remplacement de la tour LL355 Haffie Shoal

### Reference Number

- PW-23-01025137

### Solicitation Details

- Solicitation Number: 30003419
- Notice Type: Request for Proposal
- Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
- Trade Agreements: We invite bids from companies registered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).

### Project Description

The Canadian Coast Guard is seeking a contractor to design and install a replacement Aid to Navigation (AtoN) on the St. Lawrence River. The existing AtoN, known as LL355 Haffie Shoal, requires replacement on a reinforced concrete foundation. The proposed project duration is from 2023-03-22 to 2023-06-30, with a delivery timeframe of 2023-03-22 to 2023-06-30.

## Jurisdiction

- Procurement Category: Construction
- Geographic Location: Ontario (except for the National Capital Region)
- Custodian Agencies: Fisheries and Oceans Canada

## Contact Information

- Name of Contracting Entity: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
- Contact Email: [DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)

## Attachments
